enhanced_description: Bua Loy is a beloved delightful sweet treat from southern Thailand that gentle on the palate. Rice flour balls in sweet coconut milk. This easy recipe takes about 30 minutes to prepare and represents the authentic flavors of Southern Thai cuisine features intense spices, seafood, and coconut-based curries. The combination of rice flour, coconut milk, palm sugar creates a harmonious blend that has made this dish a favorite among locals and visitors alike. Perfect for those seeking affordable authentic Thai cuisine.
